Azure IOT SDK for C should be cloned to %SDK%/thirdparty/azure directory.

To clone the correct version of Azure IoT SDK, please run the following command-

git clone --recursive --branch 2017-07-14 https://github.com/Azure/azure-iot-sdk-c.git azure
